spread_parent.comment: Shows when have a spread range
Shows when have a spread range

special_ability_tooltip.comment: Should be given a CcoUnitAbility context, but if it is passed a unit ability details context reinitialises by grabbing ability context

effect_parent.comment: This used to use ShowIfChildVisible but that sometimes makes the list not show when you hover on a ability that's supposed to have it visible (see WH3-39407)

description.comment: We hide description when part of a skill tooltip or sometimes when part of collection

can_target_parent.comment: Handle targetting information in target_parent for now

effect_range_parent.comment: Shows when have an effect range

duration_parent.comment: Check we dont have multiple phases in first channel as then the active time doesnt tend to match up with all the phase durations, so hide in that case

phase_list.comment: Created for each phase in this channel

projectile_parent.comment: Shows either projectile (missile) context or bombardment project context. We never have both I am assured!

phase_header.comment: Only show header if multiple phases in the channel

label_custom_battle_info.comment: Temp solution for custom battle information like cost of upgrades, will replace with context info once custom battle rewritten to use contexts!

callback_with_context.context_function_id: IsPassive == false && IsContextValid(AbilityGroupContext) && IsDemoUIEnabled == false && IsTutorial == false && IsContextValid(RootComponent.ChildContext("spell_browser")) == false

component_text.text: Right click text that comes from db

spread_parent.comment: Shows when have a spread range

label_phase_channel.comment: Name of phase channel (self, ally, enemy). Only show if multiple phase channels

phase_channel_list.comment: Created for each phase channel (self, ally, enemy) that has phases in it. This used to use hide_if_empty on the list but changed to a visibility setter because sometimes the list would not show when it should (see WH3-39407)

can_use_text.comment: Shows when valid to use ability. Update periodically as current reason cannot use highlighted so need to update text when that changes which can be for variety of reasons which why not driving with events.

target_range_parent.comment: Shows when have an effect range

recharge_text.comment: Shows when valid to use ability. Update periodically as current reason cannot use highlighted so need to update text when that changes which can be for variety of reasons which why not driving with events.

component_text.text: Redirects projectiles back towards the firing unit.

target_text.comment: Shows who can be effected by this ability and their max counts (e.g allies, enemies)

callback_with_context.context_function_id: GetIf(MaxAffectedAllyCount != 0, Loc("nearby_allies") + GetIfElse(MaxAffectedAllyCount == -1, Format("(%s)", Loc("special_ability_tooltip_all")), Format(Loc("special_ability_max_target"), MaxAffectedAllyCount)) + GetIfElse(MaxAffectedEnemyCount != 0, " ", "")) + GetIf(MaxAffectedEnemyCount != 0, Loc("nearby_enemies") + GetIfElse(MaxAffectedEnemyCount == -1, Format("(%s)", Loc("special_ability_tooltip_all")), Format(Loc("special_ability_max_target"), MaxAffectedEnemyCount)))
